Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2013 03:08PM Carolbemi49 wrote: I have a red spot about the size of a green pea on my left breast it is not itchy or sore but feels a little dry it have been there for about 5 days I have had two surgeries on my right breast had two lumps removed but they were benign I am feeling a little worried about this spot could it be the sign of breast cancer ?.
